QueryResult.text: SELECT b.id currency_key, l.id language_code_key, l.language_code language_code, b.currency_code currency_code, a.name currency, b.currency_precision currency_precision, b.display_precision display_precision, b.eur_conv_rate euro_conversion_rate, b.is_eu_currency is_euro_currency, b.iso_number iso_number, b.is_active is_active, b.last_updated_date last_updated_date FROM cmn_captions_nls a, cmn_currencies b, cmn_languages l WHERE a.table_name = 'CMN_CURRENCIES' AND a.pk_id = b.id and l.is_dw_enabled=1 and l.language_code=a.language_code
